title: Fulsome Fusillade
data:
{{version032}}
{{spell info}}

'''Fulsome Fusillade''' is a level 8 [[Conjurations]]/[[Alchemy]] spell that gives you the {{white|Fusillade}} status, which causes beakers of random reagents to rain on nearby targets for each of the next 5 turns. Each turn, this causes 3x3 explosions of either [[fire]], [[cold]], [[electricity]], or poison-physical (70% poison, 30% physical) aimed on top of 3 random enemies. If any of those explosions overlap, the area of overlap is instead hit by a volatile alchemical reaction that deals a larger amount of non-elemental damage and has a chance to apply a random debuff.

Possible debuffs:
*[[malmutate]]
*[[slow]]
*[[weakness]]
*[[confusion]]
*[[ensnare]]
*[[petrify]]

The spell additionally drains 2 MP each turn except the first, and if you don't have enough MP left, the status ends.

==Useful Info==
This spell will never hit you, although it will hit and anger your allies, so care should be taken using this spell around allies. 

==Strategy==

==History==
*Added in [[0.32]] as the first Alchemy spell above level 6.
